Name: KiGG - 2.5
Description:
! System Requirements
!! Deployment Server System Requirements
* .Net Framework 3.5 SP1
* ASP.NET MVC 1.0 RTM
* Database (Only one option is required)
** SQL Server 2005 or later any Edition with Full-Text Search Services (Full-Text search is required for search)
** MySQL 5.x
* IIS 6.0 or IIS 7.0 (didn't test it on Windows XP IIS 5.5)
* Partial Trust is supported if outbound http requests are allowed. Kindly refer to "[discussion:Medium trust level Problem|53367]"
*Note:* More into Partial trust will be provided in the documentation

!! Development Workstation System Requirements
* Visual Studio.Net 2008 any edition with SP1 (Express Editions should work)
* .Net Framework 3.5 SP1
* ASP.NET MVC 1.0 RTM
* Included reference libraries (xUnit, Moq, DotNetOpenAuth, Enterprise Library etc...) -available with source code download-
* Database (Only one option is required)
** SQL Server 2005 or later any Edition with Full-Text Search Services (Full-Text search is required for search)
** MySQL 5.x
* IIS 6.0 or IIS 7.0 (didn't test it on Windows XP IIS 5.5)

! Features
* Upgrade to Moq 3
* Migrate to DotNetOpenAuth 3.2
* Partial Trust support
* Entity Framework based Repositories implemented
* Multi Database support through Entity Framework (SQL Server & MySQL)
* Implementation of ADO.NET Data Services to access (read) Stories (upcoming, published, by category, by tag, by submitter and by voters)

Name: KiGG - 2.2
Description:
Upgraded to ASP.NET MVC RTM 1.0.

Few Architecture refactoring:
1. Introducing EventAggregator.
2. Broadcast in Twitter
3. Ping Feed Servers.
4. Restrict based upon url prefx,
5. Full Text Search for Search

Name: KiGG - 2.1
Description:
*Upgraded to ASP.NET MVC RC1*
* Database schema changed. the version column is no longer required.
* Changed the Decorated Repository Order to reduce Logging.
* Few internal bug fixed.

*New*
* New HttpModule introduced to better Error handling.
* User List Page added.

_No Changes for Community Server, Graffiti, BlogEngine and Live Writer Plugins._

Name: Kigg - 2.0
Description: A brand new version. Complete re-work. [url:Release notes|http://weblogs.asp.net/rashid/archive/2009/01/20/introducing-dotnetshoutout-com.aspx]

Name: v1.1
Description: Making it compatible with MIX08 ASP.NET MVC Framework Preview Release.

Name: KiGG v3.0
Description:
! System Requirements
!! Deployment Server System Requirements
* .Net Framework 3.5 SP1
* ASP.NET MVC 2.0 RTM
* Database (Only one option is required) - No Database updates since version 2.5
** SQL Server 2008 or later any Edition with Full-Text Search Services (Full-Text search is required for search)
** MySQL 5.x
* IIS 6.0 or IIS 7.0 (didn't test it on Windows XP IIS 5.5)
* Partial Trust is supported if outbound http requests are allowed. Kindly refer to "[discussion:Medium trust level Problem|53367]"
*Note:* More into Partial trust will be provided in the documentation

!! Development Workstation System Requirements
* Visual Studio.Net 2008 any edition with SP1 (Express Editions should work)
* .Net Framework 3.5 SP1
* ASP.NET MVC 2.0 RTM
* Included reference libraries (xUnit, Moq, DotNetOpenAuth, Enterprise Library etc...) -available with source code download-
* Database (Only one option is required)
** SQL Server 2005 or later any Edition with Full-Text Search Services (Full-Text search is required for search)
** MySQL 5.x
* IIS 6.0 or IIS 7.0 (didn't test it on Windows XP IIS 5.5)

! Features
* Upgrade to Moq 3
* Migrate to DotNetOpenAuth 3.4.5
* Partial Trust support
* Entity Framework based Repositories implemented
* Multi Database support through Entity Framework (SQL Server & MySQL)
* Implementation of ADO.NET Data Services to access (read) Stories (upcoming, published, by category, by tag, by submitter and by voters)
